frontmatter.title: 3D Scanning for Architects
frontmatter.short_description: How can photogrammetry be used as a tool for digital sketching in 3D?
frontmatter.long_description: How can photogrammetry be used as a tool for digital sketching in 3D? In this project, I use photogrammetry combined with human gesture to develop a sculptural form for an entryway to Kent Hall at Columbia University.
